sentences.en: Didn't catch me napping that wheeze.
sentences.cn: 那个花招没能使我上当.

sentences.en: He had serious problems with his chest and wheezed and coughed all the time.
sentences.cn: 他胸部有严重问题，总是不停地气喘和咳嗽。

sentences.en: He has a slight wheeze in his chest.
sentences.cn: 他呼吸时胸部发出轻微的响声.

sentences.en: He was awakened once from a faint by a wheeze close in his ear.
sentences.cn: 有一次,他从昏迷中给一种贴着他耳朵喘息的声音惊醒了.

sentences.en: Just a little wheeze to lift the chaps'spirits - and get one over on Jerry to boot.
sentences.cn: 这只是卷振奋人心的带子,而且在德国佬的地方播放.

sentences.en: Secondhand smoke exposure causes respiratory symptoms, including cough, phlegm, wheeze, and breathlessness, among school - aged children.
sentences.cn: 暴露于二手烟的环境之中,学龄儿童会出现呼吸系统症候群, 包括咳嗽 、 痰 、 气喘和呼吸困难.

sentences.en: That truck was older than he was. It would wheeze and rattle down the road.
sentences.cn: 那卡车比他还要老, 会发出呼哧呼哧的响然后沿路开下去.

sentences.en: The cough, wheeze and shortness of breath are things that go with smoking, not with age.
sentences.cn: 这咳嗽 、 气喘和气急是吸烟而不是年龄引起的.

sentences.en: The old man managed to wheeze out a few words.
sentences.cn: 老人勉强地喘息着说出了几句话.

sentences.en: The patient coughed all night and had a slight wheeze in his chest.
sentences.cn: 病人咳嗽了一整夜,胸部有轻微的哮喘声.

words.tran_cn: 喘息着说；喘息地发出（wheeze的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 喝哧喝哧喘息声，演员自己插入的台词，（一般）笑话，俏皮话，巧妙的主意[办法]
喘息； 发出呼哧呼哧的声音
trans.tran_en: If someone wheezes, they breathe with difficulty and make a whistling sound

trans.tran_cn: 喘息，发出呼哧呼哧的喘息声
